translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽. The Chapter with Yasas
“When I was going on my alms round,
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of the pumpkin.
Welcome indeed it was for me,
the Buddha’s instruction has been done.

original: kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ”.🔽Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā sivakatthero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: katam buddhassa sāsana  ittham sudam āyasmā sivaka ttheraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: the Buddha’s instruction has been done.”🔽Thus the venerable Elder Sivaka recited these verses.
The Elder Sivaka’s Birth Story, the ninth.
